gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਪਰਮ ਪੁਰਾਨ ਕੋ ਪਾਰ ਪਾਵੈ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਬੈਠ ਕੁਰਾਨ ਕੇ ਗੀਤ ਗਾਵੈ ॥੨੩॥੧੧੩॥
transliteration: Kahoon Param Puraan Ko Paar Paavai|| Kahoon Baith Kuraan Ke Goot Gadvai||23||113||
translation: Somewhere Thou comprehendest the tenets of holy Puranas and somewhere Thou singest the songs of sacred Quran.23.113.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਸੁੱਧ ਸੇਖੰ ਕਹੂੰ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਧਰਮੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਬ੍ਰਿਧ ਅਵਸਥਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਬਾਲ ਕਰਮੰ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Suddh Sekhanndkahoon Brahm Dharamannd|| Kahoon Bridh Avasthaa Kahoon Baal Karamannd||
translation: Somewhere Thou art a True Muslim and somewhere the adherent of the religion of Brahmins. Somewhere Thou art in old age and somewhere actest as a child.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਜੁਅਾ ਸਰੂਪੰ ਜਰਾ ਰਹਤ ਦੇਹੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਨੇਹ ਦੇਹੰ ਕਹੂੰ ਤਿਅਾਗੰ ਗ੍ਰੇਹੰ ॥੨੪॥੧੧੪॥
transliteration: Kahoon Juaa Daroopan Jaraa Rahat Dehan|| Kahoon Neh Dehan Kahoon Tiaag Grehan||24||114||
translation: Somewhere Thou art a youth sans an old body. Somewhere Thou lovest the body and somewhere Thou forsakest Thy home.24.114.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਜੋਗ ਭੋਗੰ ਕਹੂੰ ਰੋਗ ਰਾਗੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਰੋਗ ਹਰਤਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਭੋਗ ਤਿਅਾਗੰ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Jog Bhogadg Kahoon Rog Raagadg|| Kahoon Rog Hartaa Kahoon Bhog Tiaagadg||
translation: Somewhere Thou art engrossed in Yoga and enjoyment and somewhere Thou art experiencing ailment and attachment. Somewhere Thou art the Remover of ailment and somewhere Thou Forsakest enjoyment.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਰਾਜ ਸਾਜੰ ਕਹੂੰ ਰਾਜ ਰੀਤੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਪੂਰਨ ਪ੍ਰਗਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਪਰਮ ਪ੍ਰੀਤੰ ॥੨੫॥੧੧੫॥
transliteration: Kahoon Raaj Saajan Kahoon Raaj Rootan|| Kahoon Puooran Pragiaa Kahoon Param Prootan||25||115||
translation: Somewhere Thou art in pomp of royalty and somewhere Thou art without kingship. Somewhere Thou art perfect intellectual and somewhere Thou art embodiment of Supreme Love.25.115.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਅਾਰਬੀ ਤੋਰਕੀ ਪਾਰਸੀ ਹੋ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਪਹਿਲਵੀ ਪਸ਼ਤਵੀ ਸੰਸਕ੍ਰਿਤੀ ਹੋ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Aaraboo Torkoo Paarsoo Ho|| Kahoon Pahilavoo Pashtavoo Sanskritoo Ho||
translation: Somewhere thou art Arabic, Somewhere Turkish, Somewhere Persian. Somewhere Thou art Pathlavi, somewhere Pushto, somewhere Sankrit.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਦੇਸ ਭਾਖਯਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਦੇਵ ਬਾਨੀ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਰਾਜ ਬਿਦਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਰਾਜਧਾਨੀ ॥੨੬॥੧੧੬॥
transliteration: Kahoon Des Bhaakhyaa Kahoon Dev Baanoo|| Kahoon Raaj Bidiaa Kahoon Raajdhaanoo||26||116||
translation: Somewhere Thou art Arabic, somewhere Turkish, somewhere Persian Somewhere Thou art the State-learning and somewhere Thou art the State Capital. 26.116.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਮੰਤ੍ਰ ਬਿਦਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਤੰਤ੍ਰ ਸਾਰੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਜੰਤ੍ਰ ਰੀਤੰ ਕਹੂੰ ਸਸਤ੍ਰ ਧਾਰੰ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Mantra Bidiaa Kahoon Tantra Saaran|| Kahoon Jantra Rootan Kahoon Sastra Dhaaran||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the instruction of mantras (spells) and somewhere Thou art the essence of Tantras. Somewhere Thou art the instruction of the method of Yantras and somewhere Thou art the wielder of arms.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਹੋਮ ਪੂਜਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਦੇਵ ਅਰਚਾ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਪਿੰਗੁਲਾ ਚਾਰਣੀ ਗੀਤ ਚਰਚਾ ॥੨੭॥੧੧੭॥
transliteration: Kdhoondhom Poojaa Kahoon Dev Archaa|| Kahoon Pingulaa Chaaranoo Goot Charchaa||27||117||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning of Homa (fire) worship, Thou art the instruction about offerings to gods. Somewhere Thou art the instruction about Prosody, somewhere Thou art the instruction about the discussion regarding the songs of minstrels. 27.117.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਬੀਨ ਬਿਦਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਗਾਨ ਗੀਤੰ ॥ ਕਹੂਮ ਮਲੇਛ ਭਾਖਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਬੇਦ ਰੀਤੰ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Boon Bidiaa Kahoon Gadn Gootan|| Kahoon Malechh Bhaakhiaa Kahoon Bed Rootan||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning about lyre, somewhere about singing song. Somewhere Thou art the language of malechhas (barbarians), somewhere about the Vedic rituals.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਬੀਨ ਬਿਦਿਅਾ ਕਹੂੰ ਗਾਨ ਗੀਤੰ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਗਾਰੜੂ ਗੂੜ੍ਹ ਕੱਖੈਂ ਕਹਾਨੀ ॥੨੮॥੧੧੮॥
transliteration: Kahoon Nrit Bidiaa Kahoon Naag Baanoo|| Kahoon Gadradoo Goodh Katthain Kahaanoo||28||118||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the learning of dancing, somewhere Thou art the language of Nagas (serpents). Somewhere Thou art Gararoo Mantra (that mantra, which effaces the snake poison) and somewhere Thou tallest the mysterious story (through astrology). 28.118.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਅੱਛਰਾ ਪੱਛਰਾ ਮੱਛਰਾ ਹੋ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਬੀਰ ਬਿਦਿਅਾ ਅਭੂਤੰ ਪ੍ਰਭਾ ਹੋ ॥
transliteration: Kahoon Achchhraa Pachchhraa Machchhraa Ho|| Kahoon Boor Bidiaa Abhootan Prabhaa Ho||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the belle of this world, somewhere the apsara (nymph of heaven) and somewhere the beautiful maid of nether-world. Somewhere Thou art the learning about the art of warfare and somewhere Thou art the non-elemental beauty.

gurmukhi: ਕਹੂੰ ਛੇਲ ਛਾਲਾ ਧਰੇ ਛਤ੍ਰਧਾਰੀ ॥ ਕਹੂੰ ਰਾਜ ਸਾਜੰ ਧਿਰਾਜਾ ਧਿਕਾਰੀ ॥੨੯॥੧੧੯॥
transliteration: Kahoon Chail Chhaadaa Ddare Chhatradhdaroo|| Kahoon Raaj Saajan Dhiraajaa-dhikdaroo||29||119||
translation: Somewhere Thou art the gallant youth, somewhere the ascetic on the deer-skin. Somewhere a king under the canopy, somewhere Thou art the ruling sovereign authority. 29.119.

gurmukhi: ਨਮੋ ਨਾਥ ਪੂਰੇ ਸਦਾ ਸਿੱਧ ਦਾਤਾ ॥ ਅਛੇਦੀ ਅਛੈ ਅਾਦਿ ਅਦ੍ਵੈ ਬਿਧਾਤਾ ॥
transliteration: Namo Naath Poore Sadaa Siddh Daataa|| Achhedoo Achhai Aadh Advai Bidhaataa||
translation: I bow before Thee, O Perfect Lord! The Donor ever of miraculous powers. Invincible, Unassailable, the Primal, Non-dual Providence.
